name: PyTorch Image Recognition of Intel Model Zoo
description: The Model Zoo for Intel Architecture contains links to pre-trained models, sample scripts, best practices, and step-by-step tutorials for many popular open-source machine learning models optimized by Intel to run on Intel® Xeon® Scalable processors.Model packages and containers for running the Model Zoo's workloads can be found at the Intel® oneContainer Portal.

content.en: Please make sure your machine supports bf16 instruction, you can use 'lscpu | grep bf16' command to check it.
content.zh: 请确保您的机器支持bf16指令，您可以使用'lscpu | grep bf16'命令来检查它。

help.en: 'Online Inference': 'bash size' = 1 performance test, 'Batch Inference': 'bash size' = default value performance test, 'Custom Inference': Custom bash size performance test, 'Accuracy': model accuracy test.
help.zh: 'Online Inference': 'bash size'=1的性能测试，'Batch Inference': 'bash size'=默认值的性能测试，'Custom Inference':自定义bash size的性能测试，'Accuracy':模型精度测试。

help.en: Please select the official given data set.
help.zh: 请选择官方给定的数据集。

help.en: Please input run time limit for the job,Format is 'Xd Xh Xm',which 'Xd' represents X days,'Xh' represents X hours and 'Xm' represents X minutes.
help.zh: 请输入job的运行时间限制，格式为“Xd Xh Xm”，“Xd”表示X天，“Xh”表示X小时，“Xm”表示X分钟。
